reply_to.body:
Well bump with some info
First round will be swiss elimination BO1 (4 matches). This means that you will play against 2 teams on Saturday 27th and other 2 on Sunday 28th.
After this the best 4 teams will play the invitationals.
The semifinals will be BO3 played on Saturday 5th and the finals will be BO3 on Sunday 6th.
reply_to.body_tagged:
Well bump with some info
First round will be swiss elimination BO1 (4 matches). This means that you will play against 2 teams on Saturday 27th and other 2 on Sunday 28th.
After this the best 4 teams will play the invitationals.
The semifinals will be BO3 played on Saturday 5th and the finals will be BO3 on Sunday 6th.

Ello guys!

After a succesful Quarter Finals of InstaNovaLikes TM, We're getting into semifinals :)!

Apollo beated Cacalmarin
Cronus beat PPB 
ETCR beat SegpaFamily
